entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Tadoussac
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:44 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pointe de l'Islet 10:00 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023
Temperature: 1.9°C
Humidity: 51 %
Dewpoint: -7.1°C
Wind: WNW 45 km/h gust 66 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow and local blowing snow beginning near midnight. Local amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023
